Mesh Stainless Steel Band Size: Suitable for 5.3''to 8.1''(135mm to 205mm)wrists. With strong magnetic closure design for these mesh bands, make it convenient for locking on your wrist.
Quick Release Pins: Easy to install and remove. With quick release spring bars on both ends, which make you connect the watch bands to your watch precisely and securely.
